last_episode_to_air.name: Unraveling the Mystery: A Big Bang Farewell
last_episode_to_air.overview: Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco will lead fans on a trip down memory lane, sharing some of the best-kept backstage secrets and personal memories from the past 12 years.

name: The Big Bang Theory
overview: Physicists Leonard and Sheldon find their nerd-centric social circle with pals Howard and Raj expanding when aspiring actress Penny moves in next door.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: University physicists Leonard and Sheldon know whether to use an integral or a differential to solve the area under a curve. But they don't have a clue about girls. Or dating. Or clothes. Or parties. Or having fun. Or, basically, life. So when a pretty blonde named Penny moves in the apartment across the hall, the guys decide to get an education outside of the classroom. Boys, you have a lot to learn.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: This season, Leonard gets a girl. So does Sheldon. Howard drives the Mars Rover into a ditch. Raj woos a terminator. Gorgeous girl-next-door Penny falls under the spell of Age of Conan. And super-smart, ueberconfident Leslie Winkler reduces mere men to spineless jellyfish.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Worlds collide in Season 3! A love affair with Penny has opened a big, wide, wonderful world of romance for Leonard. But Sheldon likes the world just the way it was, thank you. All of which makes for a zany comic triangle with brainy, clueless Sheldon and practical, grounded Penny hilariously vying for the role of hypotenuse.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: This season the Big Bang gang’s romantic universe expands. On the rebound from Penny, Leonard falls into the arms of Raj’s sister Priya. Sheldon gets a girlfriend, or rather a friend who is a girl: Amy, a dour neurobiologist who declares herself besties with Penny. Howard and Bernadette heat up. And so do Raj and Bernadette (at least in Raj’s Bollywood daydream).

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: In season five, Penny and Leonard's relationship is relaunched in full "beta test" mode, while Sheldon, Howard, and Raj discover the feminine mystique is something that cannot be easily graphed or calculated. As Sheldon makes begrudging amendments to his "Relationship Agreement" with his "friend-who-happens-to-be-a-girl" Amy Farrah Fowler, Raj contemplates an arranged marriage, and Howard is all-systems-go for both is NASA space launch and wedding to the spirited Bernadette.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: Whether on or above Earth, hilarity is outrageously universal in TV's most popular comedy featuring four forward-thinking but socially backward geniuses. Fun discoveries multiply: Leonard learns jealousy is bad for a relationship (with Penny) but science is good for seduction (of Penny). Howard finds life in the International Space Station life is no escape from terrestrial turmoil between his mom and his new wife Bernadette. Raj meets someone special who may be a good match, if he can keep her from fleeing mid-date. And then there's Sheldon. He learns what not to say after facing harassment charges or competing for tenure at work and how Dungeons & Dragons can be the icebreaker his relationship with Amy needs.

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: Leonard returns from his North Sea expedition to find that his relationship with Penny involves more beta-testing than he’s ever done in a lab. Howard’s attachment issues with the women in his life in particular and Raj’s social breakthrough with women in general provide more laughs. Bernadette and Amy stand staunchly by the men in their life, even when they’re sitting in marathon role-playing games. Sheldon sees his mom in a totally different way, parties with James Earl Jones, establishes a (sort of) bond with his idol Professor Proton and makes a scientific breakthrough that breaks down before you can say Science Friday.

seasons.name: Season 8
seasons.overview: Sheldon is rescued from his soul-searching cross-country train trip (older but no wiser) and that means The Big Bang Theory gang's all here to spread another gear's cheer as TV's most attended laugh seminar. Enrol in the comic curriculum to observe Leonard's minor surgery, which signals a major catastrophe for Sheldon, Howard's obsession over his mum's relationship with friend-turned-freeloader Stuart and the unexpected results of Penny's technique as a pharmaceutical sales rep. Discover ways to re-create proms not attended or holiday celebrations not especially beloved and play a new game based on Raj's dating life. Savour online fan Fiction by Amy, watch Bernadette take indelicate command of some delicate family matters and, who knows, you might spot a cool special guest or two.

seasons.name: Season 9
seasons.overview: Our two genius roommates, Leonard and Sheldon, and their friends are back once again (smarter, but no wiser). Last season, Sheldon went soul-searching (on a train, of course) and was prepared to make some substantial revisions on his Relationship Agreement with Amy, when everything changed. Leonard, meanwhile, was off to Vegas with Penny to finally tie the knot in the season finale. Howard finds himself alone with Bernadette after the sudden passing of his mother; while Raj is not only talking to women – he’s getting exclusive with Emily. Together, they will all learn that life is far more complicated outside of the lab as love and friendship never produce predictable results!

seasons.name: Season 10
seasons.overview: Leonard and Penny renew their vows, this time inviting their friends and family for wedding party; they also learn that marriage is about compromise, and figure out how to support each other. Sheldon and Amy experiment to take their relationship to the next level, and after an emotional struggle they move in together in Penny's old apartment. Howard and Bernadette realise that being a parent is a full-time job, but with the help of their friends they manage to find joy in raising their child. When his friends tell him he's extremely spoiled, Raj decides to stop taking his father's money and learn how to make ends meet.

seasons.name: Season 11
seasons.overview: After years of only looking out for himself, Sheldon found Amy Farrah Fowler to be the most patient woman to ever walk the earth, and... they did it! Wedding fever continues in season 11.

seasons.name: Season 12
seasons.overview: Best friends and brilliant physicists Leonard Hofstadter and Sheldon Cooper are geniuses in the lab but socially challenge outside of it. Despite this, Leonard married his beautiful, street-smart neighbour, Penny. And Sheldon, after a long courtship, wed successful neurobiologist Amy. And while aerospace engineer Howard and his adorable microbiologist wife, Bernadette, explore the predicament of being married with two kids, astrophysicist Raj considers a traditional arranged marriage. As the supersmart friends solve quotidian conundrums posed by academia. Family crises and video games, their experiments in domestic bliss never fail to produce hilarious results. But all good theories arrive at a conclusion. The twelfth and final season of "television's perpetual laughter continuum comprises" 24 supercharged episodes that take comedy to the next dimension...and beyond.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Brilliant physicist roommates Leonard and Sheldon meet their new neighbor Penny, who begins showing them that as much as they know about science, they know little about actual living.

episodes.name: The Big Bran Hypothesis
episodes.overview: Leonard volunteers to sign for a package in an attempt to make a good impression on Penny, but when he enlists Sheldon for help, his attempt at chivalry goes terribly awry.

episodes.name: The Fuzzy Boots Corollary
episodes.overview: Leonard asks a woman out after he finds out that Penny is seeing someone.

episodes.name: The Luminous Fish Effect
episodes.overview: Sheldon's getting fired forces him to explore what life has to offer outside physics, leaving Leonard to take drastic action to snap his friend out of his funk.

episodes.name: The Hamburger Postulate
episodes.overview: Fearing he's wasting his time on Penny, Leonard ends up making a connection with Leslie.

episodes.name: The Middle-Earth Paradigm
episodes.overview: Penny hosts a Halloween party, putting Leonard, Sheldon, Wolowitz, and Koothrappali through a new test of their social skills.

episodes.name: The Dumpling Paradox
episodes.overview: With Wolowitz AWOL with one of her friends, Penny's recruited to fill in for him on the guys' Halo team

episodes.name: The Grasshopper Experiment
episodes.overview: Raj's parents set him up on a blind date, but just when he discovers he can talk to her, she shows interest in Sheldon.

episodes.name: The Cooper-Hofstadter Polarization
episodes.overview: When they're invited to present at a physics conference, Sheldon's reluctance to share the credit leads to a tiff between him and Leonard, and Penny's intervention only exacerbates the situation.

episodes.name: The Loobenfeld Decay
episodes.overview: Leonard and Sheldon each lie to avoid seeing Penny's concert, but Sheldon's is a bit too complicated for his own good.

episodes.name: The Pancake Batter Anomaly
episodes.overview: With his friends knowing how sour he acts when sick—and avoiding him as a result—Sheldon is nursed by Penny, who hasn't a clue what she's in for.

episodes.name: The Jerusalem Duality
episodes.overview: With Sheldon rattled over meeting Dennis, a 15-year-old physicist who's smarter than he, Leonard helps him look for a way to debunk Dennis's research.

episodes.name: The Bat Jar Conjecture
episodes.overview: Sheldon finds himself booted from the gang's Physics Bowl team and replaced with Leslie, so he forms his own team, hoping to prove he's superior.

episodes.name: The Nerdvana Annihilation
episodes.overview: When delivery of another collectible leads to Penny's lashing out at Leonard, he decides it's time to give up his habit, much to his friends' protestation.

episodes.name: The Pork Chop Indeterminacy
episodes.overview: The rest of the gang fall for Sheldon's twin sister, and Leonard's plan to win her heart is derailed when Sheldon declares he'll be the one to decide who can date her.

episodes.name: The Peanut Reaction
episodes.overview: Penny wants to throw a surprise party for Leonard, but Sheldon's indulgence at an electronics store throws her off-track.

episodes.name: The Tangerine Factor
episodes.overview: Penny's break-up spurs Leonard to summon the courage to ask her out, and each goes to Sheldon for advice on their upcoming date.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: University physicists Leonard and Sheldon know whether to use an integral or a differential to solve the area under a curve. But they don't have a clue about girls. Or dating. Or clothes. Or parties. Or having fun. Or, basically, life. So when a pretty blonde named Penny moves in the apartment across the hall, the guys decide to get an education outside of the classroom. Boys, you have a lot to learn.

episodes.name: The Bad Fish Paradigm
episodes.overview: Penny's first date with Leonard goes awry; Penny finds Sheldon to be an unwilling confidant.

episodes.name: The Codpiece Topology
episodes.overview: A jealous Leonard reacts to Penny's new guy by rebounding with Leslie.

episodes.name: The Barbarian Sublimation
episodes.overview: Sheldon creates a monster when he introduces Penny to online gaming.

episodes.name: The Griffin Equivalency
episodes.overview: Raj gets an inflated ego and makes a play for Penny after being referenced in a magazine article.

episodes.name: The Euclid Alternative
episodes.overview: Leonard and his friends stage an intervention to force Sheldon to face his fear of driving.

episodes.name: The Cooper-Nowitzki Theorem
episodes.overview: Sheldon and the gang are confused when a young grad student is attracted to him.

episodes.name: The Panty Piñata Polarization
episodes.overview: When Sheldon bans Penny from the apartment for numerous minor infractions, she decides to retaliate.

episodes.name: The Lizard-Spock Expansion
episodes.overview: Leonard inadvertently steals away the new woman Wolowitz thinks is the love of his life.

episodes.name: The White Asparagus Triangulation
episodes.overview: Sheldon is thrilled when Leonard starts dating a woman who meets Sheldon's stringent standards.

episodes.name: The Vartabedian Conundrum
episodes.overview: Leonard asks Penny for advice when his new relationship starts moving too fast.

episodes.name: The Bath Item Gift Hypothesis
episodes.overview: Penny starts dating Leonard's handsome colleague; Leonard and his friends are tortured by Sheldon's obsession with gift-giving etiquette.

episodes.name: The Killer Robot Instability
episodes.overview: Penny's criticism of Wolowitz's romantic life pushes him into depression and AWOL for a fighting robot battle the rest of guys are depending on him for.

episodes.name: The Friendship Algorithm
episodes.overview: Sheldon creates a scientific procedure for making friends.

episodes.name: The Financial Permeability
episodes.overview: Sheldon's solution to Penny's financial difficulty leads to a confrontation between Leonard and Penny's ex-boyfriend.

episodes.name: The Maternal Capacitance
episodes.overview: Leonard and Penny are drawn together after a disastrous visit from Leonard's mother.

episodes.name: The Cushion Saturation
episodes.overview: A paintball game leads to a fight between Sheldon and Penny, and romance for Leslie and Wolowitz.

episodes.name: The Terminator Decoupling
episodes.overview: Leonard, Sheldon and Wolowitz are ecstatic to learn that a famous science-fiction actress (Summer Glau) is on board the train they are taking to San Francisco.

episodes.name: The Work Song Nanocluster
episodes.overview: Penny's home business turns into a complete nightmare when Sheldon takes over.

episodes.name: The Dead Hooker Juxtaposition
episodes.overview: Penny squares off with a new beautiful female neighbor who may become the building's "new Penny."

episodes.name: The Hofstadter Isotope
episodes.overview: A fellow comic book enthusiast's hitting on Penny leads to Leonard and Howard going to a bar's Ladies' Night.

episodes.name: The Vegas Renormalization
episodes.overview: Leonard and Koothrappali escort a heartbroken Wolowitz to Las Vegas, and Sheldon becomes locked out of his apartment and must stay with Penny.

episodes.name: The Classified Materials Turbulence
episodes.overview: Penny's second date with Stuart sees her making a comment that gives Leonard new hope for a relationship with her. Wolowitz realizes there's a crucial error in a NASA project he's working on.

episodes.name: The Monopolar Expedition
episodes.overview: The guys' plan to work over the summer at the North Pole makes Penny revaluate her feelings for Leonard.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: This season, Leonard gets a girl. So does Sheldon. Howard drives the Mars Rover into a ditch. Raj woos a terminator. Gorgeous girl-next-door Penny falls under the spell of Age of Conan. And super-smart, ueberconfident Leslie Winkler reduces mere men to spineless jellyfish.

episodes.name: The Electric Can Opener Fluctuation
episodes.overview: When Sheldon learns the guys tampered with his expedition data he got from the arctic, he leaves to Texas in disgrace. This results in the guys following him, which threatens Leonard's hope for some romantic time with Penny and the guys' friendship with Sheldon.

episodes.name: The Jiminy Conjecture
episodes.overview: Leonard and Penny struggle to recover from an awkward first hookup while Sheldon and Howard stake their best comic books on a bet to determine the species of a cricket.

episodes.name: The Gothowitz Deviation
episodes.overview: Howard and Raj visit a Goth nightclub to pick up women while Sheldon attempts to build a better Penny using chocolate-based behavior modification.

episodes.name: The Pirate Solution
episodes.overview: Raj must find a new job or be sent back to India, but Sheldon has a solution, which leaves Leonard and Penny dealing with Howard as a third wheel.

episodes.name: The Creepy Candy Coating Corollary
episodes.overview: After overhearing that Wil Wheaton is entering a trading-card competition, Sheldon decides to enter it himself. Meanwhile, Penny sets up one of her friends on a date with Wolowitz.

episodes.name: The Cornhusker Vortex
episodes.overview: Sheldon becomes Leonard's teacher in order to understand football, while an incident with flying a kite threatens Howard and Raj's friendship.

episodes.name: The Guitarist Amplification
episodes.overview: A squabble between Leonard and Penny sees Sheldon playing mediator, though out of his own incovenience from the sitiation rather than altruism.

episodes.name: The Adhesive Duck Deficiency
episodes.overview: With Leonard, Howard and Raj away camping in the desert, an injured Penny has only Sheldon to rely on.

episodes.name: The Vengeance Formulation
episodes.overview: After he's humiliated on National Public Radio, Sheldon vows to destroy Kripke, while Wolowitz tries not to destroy his new relationship with Bernadette.

episodes.name: The Gorilla Experiment
episodes.overview: Penny gets help from Sheldon in order to understand what Leonard's work is, while Wolowitz develops a jealousy when Leonard starts hanging out with his new girlfriend.

episodes.name: The Maternal Congruence
episodes.overview: A Christmas visit from his mother has Leonard discovering she's kept a lot of news from him that she shares with Sheldon and worrying if she'll approve of his romance with Penny.

episodes.name: The Psychic Vortex
episodes.overview: Leonard is aghast to find out a secret of Penny's: she believes in psychics. Meanwhile, Sheldon tries to assist Koothrappali in picking up a girl at a university mixer.

episodes.name: The Bozeman Reaction
episodes.overview: When their apartment is robbed, Leonard and Sheldon turn to their friends to create a state-of-the-art security system.

episodes.name: The Einstein Approximation
episodes.overview: Sheldon's search for the answer to a physics problem leads him to work at the Cheesecake Factory with Penny.

episodes.name: The Large Hadron Collision
episodes.overview: Leonard can only bring one guest on a trip to see CERN's Large Hadron Collider (the world's largest and highest energy particle accelerator) in Switzerland on Valentine's Day.

episodes.name: The Excelsior Acquisition
episodes.overview: Sheldon winds up in traffic court when he gets a ticket because of Penny.

episodes.name: The Precious Fragmentation
episodes.overview: When the guys find a ring from "The Lord of the Rings" at a garage sale, it threatens to tear them apart.

episodes.name: The Pants Alternative
episodes.overview: Sheldon's friends come to his aid when his fear of public speaking stands between him and a coveted award.

episodes.name: The Wheaton Recurrence
episodes.overview: A fight between Leonard and Penny threatens their relationship, while Sheldon battles Wil Wheaton in bowling.

episodes.name: The Spaghetti Catalyst
episodes.overview: When Leonard and Penny aren't speaking, Sheldon goes to extremes to keep them both happy.

episodes.name: The Plimpton Stimulation
episodes.overview: Leonard and Sheldon compete for the attention of a famous female physicist.

episodes.name: The Staircase Implementation
episodes.overview: Leonard tells Penny about how he met Sheldon for the first time...and what happened to the elevator.

episodes.name: The Lunar Excitation
episodes.overview: While Penny worries that dating Leonard has ruined her for normal guys, Wolowitz and Koothrappali search for Sheldon's perfect match online.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Worlds collide in Season 3! A love affair with Penny has opened a big, wide, wonderful world of romance for Leonard. But Sheldon likes the world just the way it was, thank you. All of which makes for a zany comic triangle with brainy, clueless Sheldon and practical, grounded Penny hilariously vying for the role of hypotenuse.

episodes.name: The Robotic Manipulation
episodes.overview: Penny tags along on Sheldon's first ever date; Wolowitz finds a new use for a robotic arm.

episodes.name: The Cruciferous Vegetable Amplification
episodes.overview: Realizing he will not live long enough to download his consciousness into a robot body, Sheldon tries to extend his life span.

episodes.name: The Zazzy Substitution
episodes.overview: The guys are concerned as Sheldon searches for an alternative to human companionship.

episodes.name: The Hot Troll Deviation
episodes.overview: An embarrassing secret of Wolowitz's comes to light, while Sheldon and Raj have a small war at work.

episodes.name: The Desperation Emanation
episodes.overview: Leonard realizes he’s the only one without a girlfriend, while Sheldon wants to get rid of his.

episodes.name: The Irish Pub Formulation
episodes.overview: Leonard keeps an affair a secret from Sheldon, Howard and Raj.

episodes.name: The Apology Insufficiency
episodes.overview: Sheldon's answers during an FBI interview put Wolowitz's security clearance in jeopardy.

episodes.name: The 21-Second Excitation
episodes.overview: While the guys camp in line for a long-awaited movie screening, Penny and Bernadette invite Amy to her first slumber party.

episodes.name: The Boyfriend Complexity
episodes.overview: Penny asks Leonard to lie to her father, while Howard, Raj and Bernadette pull an all-nighter at a telescope.

episodes.name: The Alien Parasite Hypothesis
episodes.overview: Amy finds she has sexual feelings for Penny's ex, while Koothrappali and Wolowitz try to prove who would be the better superhero.

episodes.name: The Justice League Recombination
episodes.overview: The guys find a "super" use for Penny's new boyfriend, Zack, when they enter a costume contest as the Justice League.

episodes.name: The Bus Pants Utilization
episodes.overview: Leonard's idea for a smartphone app derails his friendship with Sheldon.

episodes.name: The Love Car Displacement
episodes.overview: Bernadette runs into her ex-boyfriend while attending a science event with Wolowitz.

episodes.name: The Thespian Catalyst
episodes.overview: Hoping it will make him a better teacher, Sheldon has Penny give him acting lessons. Raj has fantasies about a friend's girlfriend.

episodes.name: The Benefactor Factor
episodes.overview: A wealthy donor to the university makes Leonard consider how far he's willing to go for the sake of science.

episodes.name: The Cohabitation Formulation
episodes.overview: As Wolowitz contemplates taking things with Bernadette to the next level, Leonard rekindles his relationship with Raj's sister.

episodes.name: The Toast Derivation
episodes.overview: Sheldon becomes concerned when everybody begins to hang out at Raj's apartment and discovers Leonard is the center of the group.

episodes.name: The Prestidigitation Approximation
episodes.overview: Sheldon is baffled by Wolowitz's magic trick. Meanwhile, Leonard realizes dating Priya may make it impossible to continue being friends with Penny.

episodes.name: The Zarnecki Incursion
episodes.overview: Sheldon's online-game account is hacked by Todd Zarnecki, who then proceeds to steal all his items prompting the guys to go on a quest to retrieve them.  Penny, Bernadette and Amy discuss how Penny groomed Leonard to be willing to try various things and more adventurous boyfriend... for some other woman — Priya.

episodes.name: The Herb Garden Germination
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy decide to start several rumors about the others as a test. Meanwhile, Howard takes his relationship with Bernadette to even higher level.

episodes.name: The Agreement Dissection
episodes.overview: When Leonard spends too much time in the shower with Priya, Sheldon charges Leonard with two violations of the roommate agreement. However, before he can get too far, Priya uses her skills as a lawyer to nullify the charges due to the agreement's vague wording, much to Sheldon's dismay. When the guys take advantage of Priya's skills in order to eat Greek food on pizza night, Sheldon goes to Penny, who invites him to a girls' night out with Amy and Bernadette, which Sheldon agrees to after Penny mentions that they may be talking trash about Priya. After the girls drink some cocktails, they decide to take Sheldon dancing, which Sheldon reluctantly goes along with. After dancing, Sheldon takes an intoxicated Amy back to her apartment and as well as talking about Priya, meets a monkey who is addicted to smoking cigarettes. Amy tells Sheldon not to give in to Priya's law skills, before kissing him and going to her bathroom to vomit.

episodes.name: The Wildebeest Implementation
episodes.overview: Raj attempts to cure his social anxiety disorder while Penny uses Bernadette to spy on Leonard and his girlfriend.

episodes.name: The Engagement Reaction
episodes.overview: When Howard finally breaks the news to his mom that he's engaged to Bernadette, it lands her in the hospital.

episodes.name: The Roommate Transmogrification
episodes.overview: When Bernadette receives her PhD, Wolowitz feels emasculated. Raj and Leonard swap places and Penny does something she's regrets.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: This season the Big Bang gang’s romantic universe expands. On the rebound from Penny, Leonard falls into the arms of Raj’s sister Priya. Sheldon gets a girlfriend, or rather a friend who is a girl: Amy, a dour neurobiologist who declares herself besties with Penny. Howard and Bernadette heat up. And so do Raj and Bernadette (at least in Raj’s Bollywood daydream).

episodes.name: The Skank Reflex Analysis
episodes.overview: Penny is worried with how damaged her friendship with the guys will be in the aftermath of her sleeping with Raj while Sheldon becomes the leader of the paintball team.

episodes.name: The Infestation Hypothesis
episodes.overview: A fight between Sheldon and Penny leaves Amy caught in the middle, while Leonard tries to spice up his long-distance relationship with Priya.

episodes.name: The Pulled Groin Extrapolation
episodes.overview: Leonard and Amy get to know each other better, while Howard and Bernadette spend the weekend with Mrs. Wolowitz.

episodes.name: The Wiggly Finger Catalyst
episodes.overview: Penny plays Matchmaker for Raj, which results in him finding a girl he is comfortable talking to.

episodes.name: The Russian Rocket Reaction
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Leonard get invited to a party at Wil Wheaton's house, and Howard gets an out-of-this-world opportunity.

episodes.name: The Rhinitis Revelation
episodes.overview: Sheldon's mother, Mary Cooper, comes to visit, but Sheldon is annoyed that she also spends time with the rest of the gang, instead of catering to his every demand.

episodes.name: The Good Guy Fluctuation
episodes.overview: A cute comic book artist puts Leonard and Priya’s relationship to the test, while Sheldon tries to scare the guys for Halloween.

episodes.name: The Isolation Permutation
episodes.overview: Amy becomes heartbroken when she discovers that Penny and Bernadette went wedding dress shopping without her.

episodes.name: The Ornithophobia Diffusion
episodes.overview: Leonard and Penny try hanging out as friends on a 'non-date', but end up purposely ruining each others chances with perspective dates. Meanwhile, Sheldon enlists the help of Bernadette and Amy to overcome his fear of birds.

episodes.name: The Flaming Spittoon Acquisition
episodes.overview: When Stuart asks Amy out on a date, Sheldon must confront his feelings and consider where his relationship with Amy is going.

episodes.name: The Speckerman Recurrence
episodes.overview: Leonard must face his fears after being contacted by his high school tormentor.

episodes.name: The Shiny Trinket Maneuver
episodes.overview: Sheldon gets in trouble with Amy when he isn't impressed by her recent accomplishment, and Howard must come to grips with Bernadette's dislike of children.

episodes.name: The Recombination Hypothesis
episodes.overview: Leonard, who broke up with Priya, asks Penny out to a spur-of the-moment romantic dinner for two, and the duo contemplates on their relationship.

episodes.name: The Beta Test Initiation
episodes.overview: Leonard and Penny deal with the idea of starting a relationship again and Raj finally finds a "woman" he can talk to without being drunk, in the form of Siri on his new phone. Meanwhile, Sheldon decides to start a YouTube series entitled "Sheldon Cooper presents Fun with Flags" with the help of Amy.

episodes.name: The Friendship Contraction
episodes.overview: Sheldon's selfish demands force Leonard to reconsider their friendship. Meanwhile, Wolowitz tries to pick his astronaut nickname.

episodes.name: The Vacation Solution
episodes.overview: When Sheldon is forced to take his vacation, he goes to work with Amy in her neurobiology lab.

episodes.name: The Rothman Disintegration
episodes.overview: Sheldon battles Kripke for a coveted office at the university. Penny receives a very unusual gift from Amy.

episodes.name: The Werewolf Transformation
episodes.overview: Sheldon becomes agitated when his regular barber is out sick. Astronaut training causes Howard to reconsider wanting to go into space. Penny beats Leonard in chess, the first time she plays.

episodes.name: The Weekend Vortex
episodes.overview: Sheldon must choose between joining Amy at her aunt's birthday party or playing videogames all weekend with the guys.

episodes.name: The Transporter Malfunction
episodes.overview: Penny buys Leonard and Sheldon “Star Trek” collectibles as a thank-you, leading Sheldon to be haunted by Mr. Spock. Meanwhile, Raj decides he has met the “Future Mrs. Koothrappali” after his parents set him up on a date.

episodes.name: The Hawking Excitation
episodes.overview: When Wolowitz gets to work with Stephen Hawking, Sheldon is willing to do anything to meet his hero.

episodes.name: The Stag Convergence
episodes.overview: After the guys throw Howard a bachelor party, Bernadette reconsiders marrying him after learning about his sexual history.

episodes.name: The Launch Acceleration
episodes.overview: When NASA moves up Howard's mission, he must face his fears and Bernadette's dad, thus putting the wedding plans in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Leonard says something surprising to Penny in the bedroom.

episodes.name: The Countdown Reflection
episodes.overview: The fifth season ends with Howard and Bernadette deciding to get married before his NASA mission, causing the gang to scurry into overdrive in an effort to stage the wedding. NASA astronaut Mike Massimino has a cameo as himself.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: In season five, Penny and Leonard's relationship is relaunched in full "beta test" mode, while Sheldon, Howard, and Raj discover the feminine mystique is something that cannot be easily graphed or calculated. As Sheldon makes begrudging amendments to his "Relationship Agreement" with his "friend-who-happens-to-be-a-girl" Amy Farrah Fowler, Raj contemplates an arranged marriage, and Howard is all-systems-go for both is NASA space launch and wedding to the spirited Bernadette.

episodes.name: The Date Night Variable
episodes.overview: With his friends on dates, Raj must face his loneliness. Also, Wolowitz is caught in an argument between Bernadette and his mom, even while he’s in space.

episodes.name: The Decoupling Fluctuation
episodes.overview: When Sheldon learns that Penny is thinking about breaking up with Leonard, he tries to intervene. Meanwhile, in space, the other astronauts pick on Howard.

episodes.name: The Higgs Boson Observation
episodes.overview: Amy feels threatened when Sheldon hires a young female assistant, and the pressure of being in space takes its toll on Wolowitz.

episodes.name: The Re-Entry Minimization
episodes.overview: When Wolowitz returns from space, he doesn’t get the hero’s welcome he expected. Meanwhile, Game Night turns into a battle of the sexes.

episodes.name: The Holographic Excitation
episodes.overview: The gang celebrates Halloween at Stuart’s comic book store. Meanwhile, Leonard seduces Penny with science.

episodes.name: The Extract Obliteration
episodes.overview: Sheldon’s relationship with Stephen Hawking is threatened over a game of “Words with Friends,” and Penny secretly enrolls in a class at the local college.

episodes.name: The Habitation Configuration
episodes.overview: Wolowitz struggles with moving out of his mother’s house. Meanwhile, Sheldon is caught in the middle of an argument between Amy and Wil Wheaton.

episodes.name: The 43 Peculiarity
episodes.overview: Raj and Howard try to to figure out why Sheldon disappears at 2:45 every afternoon; jealousy arises in Penny and Leonard's relationship.

episodes.name: The Parking Spot Escalation
episodes.overview: When the University reassigns Sheldon’s parking spot to Wolowitz, their fight affects the whole gang.

episodes.name: The Fish Guts Displacement
episodes.overview: When Amy gets sick, Sheldon tries to nurse her back to health; Wolowitz and his father-in-law plan a fishing trip.

episodes.name: The Santa Simulation
episodes.overview: During a Dungeons and Dragons game, Sheldon revisits Christmas memories; Amy, Penny and Bernadette look for a date for Raj.

episodes.name: The Egg Salad Equivalency
episodes.overview: When Sheldon is accused of sexual harassment, he ends up getting Raj, Leonard and Howard in trouble.

episodes.name: The Bakersfield Expedition
episodes.overview: As the guys don costumes and go on a road trip to a comic book convention, the ladies decide to stay home and try to interpret a comic book.

episodes.name: The Cooper/Kripke Inversion
episodes.overview: Sheldon faces a crisis of confidence when he is forced to work with his nemesis, Barry Kripke; Raj and Howard buy expensive action figures of themselves.

episodes.name: The Spoiler Alert Segmentation
episodes.overview: A fight between Sheldon and Leonard impacts Amy and Penny's living arrangements; while Howard is away, Raj helps Mrs. Wolowitz out.

episodes.name: The Tangible Affection Proof
episodes.overview: The guys search for a perfect Valentine's Day gift for their significant others; Stuart and Raj host a "lonely people" party at the comic book store.

episodes.name: The Monster Isolation
episodes.overview: After a bad date, Koothrappali decides to never leave his apartment; Penny's acting skills impress Sheldon.

episodes.name: The Contractual Obligation Implementation
episodes.overview: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard give lectures on science to junior high students. The girls ditch work to go to Disneyland. Raj devises a date for Lucy that fixes their social anxiety problems.

episodes.name: The Closet Reconfiguration
episodes.overview: Howard considers whether or not he should open a letter from his father; Penny and Leonard host a "grown-up" cocktail party.

episodes.name: The Tenure Turbulence
episodes.overview: The girls get involved when Leonard, Sheldon and Raj compete for tenure at the University.

episodes.name: The Closure Alternative
episodes.overview: Amy tries to help Sheldon get over his compulsive need for closure when one of his favorite TV shows is canceled; Raj discovers a secret about Lucy.

episodes.name: The Proton Resurgence
episodes.overview: Leonard and Sheldon hire the host (Bob Newhart) of their favorite childhood TV show to perform; Bernadette and Howard run into trouble while dog-sitting for Raj's pet.

episodes.name: The Love Spell Potential
episodes.overview: A date between Raj and Lucy takes both of them out of their comfort zones. After a trip to Las Vegas goes awry, the girls join in on a Dungeons and Dragons game, which causes Amy and Sheldon to re-evaluate their relationship.

episodes.name: The Bon Voyage Reaction
episodes.overview: When Leonard receives an exciting opportunity to work overseas, Penny and Sheldon are thrown for a loop. Raj and Lucy's relationship comes to a crossroad.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: Whether on or above Earth, hilarity is outrageously universal in TV's most popular comedy featuring four forward-thinking but socially backward geniuses. Fun discoveries multiply: Leonard learns jealousy is bad for a relationship (with Penny) but science is good for seduction (of Penny). Howard finds life in the International Space Station life is no escape from terrestrial turmoil between his mom and his new wife Bernadette. Raj meets someone special who may be a good match, if he can keep her from fleeing mid-date. And then there's Sheldon. He learns what not to say after facing harassment charges or competing for tenure at work and how Dungeons & Dragons can be the icebreaker his relationship with Amy needs.

episodes.name: The Hofstadter Insufficiency
episodes.overview: With Leonard away, Sheldon and Penny spend quality time together sharing intimate secrets. Also, Wolowitz helps Raj get over his ex-girlfriend.

episodes.name: The Deception Verification
episodes.overview: Leonard and Sheldon's friendship is tested; Howard's latest foray into helping his mother has some disastrous side effects.

episodes.name: The Scavenger Vortex
episodes.overview: When the entire gang competes in a scavenger hunt designed by Raj, it brings out the best - and worst - in everyone.

episodes.name: The Raiders Minimization
episodes.overview: Sheldon gets mad at Amy for ruining one of his favorite movies, Raj and Stuart try to make their online dating profiles more appealing, and Leonard tries to play the sympathy card with Penny.

episodes.name: The Workplace Proximity
episodes.overview: Amy starts working at Caltech which causes friction with Sheldon. Howard agrees with Sheldon who mentions this to Bernadette causing a big fight for the Wolowitzes.

episodes.name: The Romance Resonance
episodes.overview: Sheldon's latest scientific breakthrough leaves him feeling like a fraud; a romantic gesture between Howard and Bernadette causes Penny to up her game with Leonard.

episodes.name: The Proton Displacement
episodes.overview: Sheldon seeks payback when Arthur "Professor Proton" Jeffries asks Leonard for help on a project instead of him. Raj gets upset at Howard for crashing his night with the girls.

episodes.name: The Itchy Brain Simulation
episodes.overview: When a mistake comes to light, Sheldon makes Leonard walk a mile in his shoes; Penny decides to confront Raj's ex-girlfriend, Lucy.

episodes.name: The Thanksgiving Decoupling
episodes.overview: Sheldon protests when the gang drags him to Mrs. Wolowitz’s house for Thanksgiving.  Meanwhile, Penny and Leonard must deal with a mistake from her past.

episodes.name: The Discovery Dissipation
episodes.overview: Leonard has to deal with the fallout of disproving Sheldon's new scientific discovery. Raj spends a week at Howard and Bernadette's apartment.

episodes.name: The Cooper Extraction
episodes.overview: While Sheldon is at home in Texas, the rest of the gang realizes how much he has changed their lives as they decorate the apartment Christmas tree.

episodes.name: The Hesitation Ramification
episodes.overview: When Penny’s big acting break on NCIS is a bust, Leonard struggles to help her, which results in Penny asking Leonard a bold relationship question. Meanwhile, Raj and Stuart try to practice their social skills, and Sheldon navigates the intricacies of being funny.

episodes.name: The Occupation Recalibration
episodes.overview: Sheldon tries to relax after he is forced to take a vacation. Meanwhile, Leonard struggles to be supportive of Penny after she quits her job, and Bernadette seeks Stuart’s help in replacing one of Howard’s comic books. Also, Amy receives an unwanted attention from a co-worker.

episodes.name: The Convention Conundrum
episodes.overview: After the guys can’t get Comic-Con tickets, Sheldon tries to hold his own convention and winds up spending a wild night with James Earl Jones. Meanwhile, the girls try to feel more mature by going to a fancy hotel for tea.

episodes.name: The Locomotive Manipulation
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy take a train ride to Napa Valley with Howard and Bernadette on Valentine's Day. Leonard and Penny take Raj's dog to the vet when she accidentally eats some chocolate.

episodes.name: The Table Polarization
episodes.overview: Leonard buys a dining room table and it causes Sheldon to reevaluate the changes in his life. Meanwhile, Wolowitz is offered a chance to go back to space and Bernadette struggles with whether or not to encourage him.

episodes.name: The Friendship Turbulence
episodes.overview: After arguing with Sheldon, Howard tries to make amends by taking him to NASA headquarters in Houston. Penny has second thoughts about quitting her waitressing job when her car dies. Amy gets involved in trying to find Raj a date.

episodes.name: The Mommy Observation
episodes.overview: When Sheldon visits his Mom in Houston, he is forced to confront a new reality. Meanwhile, Raj’s ‘Murder Mystery’ party starts some fights within the gang.

episodes.name: The Indecision Amalgamation
episodes.overview: While Raj is wracked with guilt when he tries to date two women at once, Penny wrestles with whether to take a role in a cheesy movie and Sheldon is torn trying to choose between two gaming systems.

episodes.name: The Relationship Diremption
episodes.overview: Sheldon faces a personal crisis after deciding he’s wasting his time with string theory. Meanwhile, a double date between Raj, Emily and the Wolowitzes ends in embarrassment for Howard.

episodes.name: The Anything Can Happen Recurrence
episodes.overview: To prepare for a date with Emily, Howard acclimates Raj to horror movies. Penny and Sheldon are upset when they discover Amy and Bernadette lied to avoid hanging out with them.

episodes.name: The Proton Transmogrification
episodes.overview: As the gang celebrates Star Wars Day, Sheldon has difficulty dealing with the recent death of Arthur "Professor Proton" Jeffries.

episodes.name: The Gorilla Dissolution
episodes.overview: A bad day causes Penny to reevaluate her life choices – including Leonard. Meanwhile, Howard and Bernadette struggle to care for Mrs. Wolowitz, and Raj gets relationship advice from Sheldon.

episodes.name: The Status Quo Combustion
episodes.overview: Sheldon get upset about his career, the destruction of the comic book store and Leonard and Penny's future living arrangements. Howard and Bernadette can't keep hold of a caretaker for his mother. With his entire world changing around him, Sheldon considers a major move.

7.name: Season 7
7.overview: Leonard returns from his North Sea expedition to find that his relationship with Penny involves more beta-testing than he’s ever done in a lab. Howard’s attachment issues with the women in his life in particular and Raj’s social breakthrough with women in general provide more laughs. Bernadette and Amy stand staunchly by the men in their life, even when they’re sitting in marathon role-playing games. Sheldon sees his mom in a totally different way, parties with James Earl Jones, establishes a (sort of) bond with his idol Professor Proton and makes a scientific breakthrough that breaks down before you can say Science Friday.

episodes.name: The Locomotion Interruption
episodes.overview: Leonard and Amy make an unexpected trip to Arizona to fetch Sheldon; Penny interviews for a job at Bernadette's company; Stuart's relationship with Mrs. Wolowitz disturbs Howard.

episodes.name: The Junior Professor Solution
episodes.overview: Sheldon is forced to teach a class as a Junior Professor and Howard decides to enroll in it. Meanwhile, Amy plays both sides when tension arises between Penny and Bernadette.

episodes.name: The First Pitch Insufficiency
episodes.overview: Wolowitz feels nervous when he is asked to throw the first pitch at a Los Angeles Angels game. Penny and Leonard want to prove Sheldon wrong after he says he and Amy are the better couple.

episodes.name: The Hook-Up Reverberation
episodes.overview: Raj's honesty comes back to haunt him when his new girlfriend is unfriendly to Penny. The guys think about becoming part owners in Stuart's store.

episodes.name: The Focus Attenuation
episodes.overview: The girls head to Las Vegas for some weekend fun, while the guys try to invent something cool, but only come up with new ways to procrastinate.

episodes.name: The Expedition Approximation
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Raj test whether they could survive a dark-matter research expedition in a salt mine by simulating the conditions in a steam tunnel deep underground. Meanwhile, Leonard and Penny seek advice from Howard and Bernadette after they fight about money.

episodes.name: The Misinterpretation Agitation
episodes.overview: The guys try to help Penny out of an awkward work dilemma, when a smitten doctor shows up at her door after her flirtatious sales techniques work a little too well. Meanwhile, Amy and Bernadette argue over whether or not female scientists should play up their sexuality.

episodes.name: The Prom Equivalency
episodes.overview: The girls decide to re-enact their high school proms with the guys. While Sheldon feels under pressure to commit to his relationship with Amy, Howard worries about who Stuart will bring as his date.

episodes.name: The Septum Deviation
episodes.overview: When Leonard gets minor surgery on his nose, Sheldon is the one in need of sympathy. Meanwhile, Raj's parents' impending divorce causes Howard and Bernadette to work on their own marriage.

episodes.name: The Champagne Reflection
episodes.overview: While Sheldon says a tearful goodbye to the final installment of "Fun with Flags", Leonard, Howard and Raj search for something significant in a dead professor's research. And Bernadette finds out what her colleagues really think of her.

episodes.name: The Clean Room Infiltration
episodes.overview: Leonard and Howard turn to Raj for help in dealing with a work emergency when they nearly come to blows after blaming each other for a potential disaster at the university. Amy throws an authentic Victorian Christmas party, while Sheldon seeks revenge on her for making him celebrate the holidays.

episodes.name: The Space Probe Disintegration
episodes.overview: Howard tries to distract Raj, who is anxiously awaiting data from a space probe he helped launch. Meanwhile, Sheldon and Leonard go dress shopping with Penny and Amy.

episodes.name: The Anxiety Optimization
episodes.overview: When Sheldon becomes stuck in a rut with his work, the gang tries to help him by raising his stress levels. Howard teases Raj with a game called "Emily or Cinnamon?"

episodes.name: The Troll Manifestation
episodes.overview: Leonard and Sheldon publish a paper which is widely accepted except for comments from an internet troll. Meanwhile, the girls reminisce about embarrassing incidents from their past.

episodes.name: The Comic Book Store Regeneration
episodes.overview: Howard receives some shocking news as everyone prepares for the reopening of Stuart’s comic book store. Penny teaches Sheldon how to “let it go,” but can’t follow her own advice after she learns something infuriating about Amy. Also, Leonard and Raj think they spot Nathan Fillion at a restaurant.

episodes.name: The Intimacy Acceleration
episodes.overview: As a joke, Sheldon and Penny try an experiment designed to make participants fall in love. Meanwhile, Leonard, Amy, Raj and Emily spend the evening trying to escape a room with a “zombie.” And, after returning from Mrs. Wolowitz’ funeral, Bernadette and Howard run into trouble at the airport.

episodes.name: The Colonization Application
episodes.overview: A trip to the pet store ends in a fight after Amy learns Sheldon has applied for a one-way mission to colonize Mars. Meanwhile, Leonard surprises Penny with a very "adult" purchase, and Raj gets into trouble when he snoops around Emily's apartment.

episodes.name: The Leftover Thermalization
episodes.overview: Friction ensues when a magazine fails to mention Leonard in an article about the paper he co-wrote with Sheldon. Also, a blackout at Mrs. Wolowitz’s home leads to a final family dinner in her honor.

episodes.name: The Skywalker Incursion
episodes.overview: When Leonard and Sheldon are invited to speak at UC Berkeley, they take a detour to try to meet an idol. Also, when Bernadette and Howard battle over the fate of his Doctor Who TARDIS, Raj and Amy offer to settle the dispute with a game of ping pong.

episodes.name: The Fortification Implementation
episodes.overview: When Sheldon and Amy build a blanket fort, they come to major crossroads in their relationship. Also, Howard meets the half-brother he never knew he had. Meanwhile, Penny is invited to appear on Wil Wheaton’s podcast, but things turn awkward when Leonard joins them.

episodes.name: The Communication Deterioration
episodes.overview: When Raj is asked to create a message in case a NASA mission discovers alien life, the guys fight over what he should do. Also, Penny is torn between auditioning for a movie or keeping her successful pharmaceutical sales job.

episodes.name: The Graduation Transmission
episodes.overview: Howard questions his engineering abilities when he and Sheldon can’t get a toy drone to fly. Meanwhile, a cancelled flight nearly prevents Leonard from giving the commencement address at his former high school, and Raj pits his parents against each other when his father cuts him off financially.

episodes.name: The Maternal Combustion
episodes.overview: Personalities collide when Sheldon and Leonard’s mothers finally meet. Meanwhile, Howard finally decides to “man up” and do his fair share of the housework – but not without a little help from his friends.

episodes.name: The Commitment Determination
episodes.overview: As Sheldon presses Leonard and Penny to set a wedding date, he encounters major changes in his own relationship with Amy. Meanwhile, Raj contemplates breaking up with Emily, and Howard and Bernadette struggle with asking Stuart to move out of their house.

8.name: Season 8
8.overview: Sheldon is rescued from his soul-searching cross-country train trip (older but no wiser) and that means The Big Bang Theory gang's all here to spread another gear's cheer as TV's most attended laugh seminar. Enrol in the comic curriculum to observe Leonard's minor surgery, which signals a major catastrophe for Sheldon, Howard's obsession over his mum's relationship with friend-turned-freeloader Stuart and the unexpected results of Penny's technique as a pharmaceutical sales rep. Discover ways to re-create proms not attended or holiday celebrations not especially beloved and play a new game based on Raj's dating life. Savour online fan Fiction by Amy, watch Bernadette take indelicate command of some delicate family matters and, who knows, you might spot a cool special guest or two.

episodes.name: The Matrimonial Momentum
episodes.overview: After driving to Vegas to get married, Penny struggles with Leonard’s confession that he kissed another girl. Also, Sheldon doesn't know how to act after Amy pushes pause on their relationship.

episodes.name: The Separation Oscillation
episodes.overview: Leonard confronts the woman he kissed on the North Sea in an attempt to set Penny's mind at ease. Also, Sheldon films a special episode of "Fun with Flags" after his breakup with Amy, and Bernadette feels guilty about withholding a secret from Penny.

episodes.name: The Bachelor Party Corrosion
episodes.overview: The guys' science skills are put to the test when they get a flat tire during Leonard's bachelor party weekend in Mexico. Also, the girls force Penny to finally tell her family that she eloped with Leonard.

episodes.name: The 2003 Approximation
episodes.overview: Sheldon learns of an impending change in his living arrangements and decides to revert back to 2003, a simpler time before he met Leonard and Penny. Also, Howard and Raj form a band to play at the Comic Book Store.

episodes.name: The Perspiration Implementation
episodes.overview: The guys take a fencing lesson from Barry Kripke and Sheldon finds himself in an awkward position when Kripke expresses interest in Amy. Also, when Stuart struggles to get female customers at the Comic Book Store, Penny, Amy and Bernadette come by to help him out.

episodes.name: The Helium Insufficiency
episodes.overview: In the midst of a nation-wide helium shortage, Sheldon and Leonard take desperate measures to get the supplies they need. Also, Penny and Bernadette download a dating app on Amy's phone to try and find her a new man.

episodes.name: The Spock Resonance
episodes.overview: Wil Wheaton interviews Sheldon for a Star Trek documentary where he reveals the ring and his plan to propose to Amy.  Bernadette wants to start renovating the house and the topic of starting a family together with Howard is brought up.

episodes.name: The Mystery Date Observation
episodes.overview: Sheldon, Wolowitz and Koothrappali post an online advertisement to find Sheldon a new girlfriend. Also, when Amy is coy with details about a guy she is dating, Penny and Bernadette decide to spy on her.

episodes.name: The Platonic Permutation
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy try hanging out as friends when they spend Thanksgiving together at the aquarium. Also, Wolowitz reluctantly agrees to volunteer at the soup kitchen with Bernadette, Raj and Emily, and Penny discovers that Leonard knows more about her than she thought.

episodes.name: The Earworm Reverberation
episodes.overview: Sheldon has a revelation when he realizes why a song was stuck in his head. Also, Amy invites Dave over for dinner despite their previously awkward date, and Wolowitz and Koothrappali become obsessed with a fan of their band, "Footprints on the Moon".

episodes.name: The Opening Night Excitation
episodes.overview: After more than five years of dating, Sheldon and Amy spend their first night together. Also, Leonard, Wolowitz, and Koothrappali must decide who will take their extra Star Wars movie ticket.

episodes.name: The Sales Call Sublimation
episodes.overview: Penny gets more than she bargained for when Leonard agrees to meet with a psychiatrist on her behalf. Also, Sheldon and Koothrappali collaborate on an astronomical discovery, and Wolowitz and Bernadette can't believe what they are feeling after Stuart moves out.

episodes.name: The Empathy Optimization
episodes.overview: After having to deal with a sick Sheldon, Leonard, Penny and the gang try to treat themselves to a Sheldon-free weekend.

episodes.name: The Meemaw Materialization
episodes.overview: Meemaw meets Amy, but it isn't all roses. Meemaw seems to have an axe to grind with her. Sheldon comes to Amy's defense, but not before Meemaw lets a little secret of his slip.

episodes.name: The Valentino Submergence
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy host a live Valentine's Day episode of Fun with Flags, Leonard and Penny grapple with getting older, Howard and Bernadette find a surprise in their hot tub and Raj is torn between Emily and the cute girl he met at the Comic Bookstore.

episodes.name: The Positive Negative Reaction
episodes.overview: When the gang finds out about Bernadette’s pregnancy, they celebrate by  singing karaoke. Also, Bernadette is concerned when Wolowitz freaks out  over her pregnancy announcement, and Wolowitz is convinced he must make  more money to provide for the baby.

episodes.name: The Celebration Experimentation
episodes.overview: After more than nine years together, the gang finally celebrates Sheldon’s birthday, surprising him with a special guest.

episodes.name: The Application Deterioration
episodes.overview: Leonard, Sheldon, and Wolowitz run into problems when they file for a patent for their infinite persistence gyroscope. Also, Penny, Amy and Bernadette give Koothrappali dating advice when Emily reaches out to him after their breakup.

episodes.name: The Solder Excursion Diversion
episodes.overview: Amy is shocked at a revelation from Sheldon after she buys him a new laptop. Also, Koothrappali sells out Leonard and Wolowitz after they lie to their wives in order to attend an early screening of a movie.

episodes.name: The Big Bear Precipitation
episodes.overview: Sheldon spills a secret of Leonard’s when the two take a weekend cabin  trip with Penny and Amy. Also, when Koothrappali goes overboard with  pregnancy gifts, Wolowitz and Bernadette must draw the line.

episodes.name: The Viewing Party Combustion
episodes.overview: Everyone must choose sides when a small argument between Leonard and  Sheldon erupts into a heated fight during a group get-together.

episodes.name: The Fermentation Bifurcation
episodes.overview: The gang goes to a wine bar and runs into Penny’s old boyfriend, Zack. Also, Bernadette gets stuck spending the evening with Sheldon when she can’t go wine tasting with the group, and things don’t go as planned when Koothrappali introduces his new girlfriend, Claire.

episodes.name: The Line Substitution Solution
episodes.overview: Sheldon hires Stuart to spend the day with Amy when he’d rather go to a movie screening. Also, Leonard’s mother, Beverly, comes to town and Penny struggles to make a connection with her.

episodes.name: The Convergence Convergence
episodes.overview: Chaos ensues when Leonard’s recently divorced parents, Alfred and Beverly, and Sheldon’s devoutly religious mother, Mary, come to town. Also, Wolowitz and Koothrappali think the government is out to get them when they are contacted about their guidance system.

9.name: Season 9
9.overview: Our two genius roommates, Leonard and Sheldon, and their friends are back once again (smarter, but no wiser). Last season, Sheldon went soul-searching (on a train, of course) and was prepared to make some substantial revisions on his Relationship Agreement with Amy, when everything changed. Leonard, meanwhile, was off to Vegas with Penny to finally tie the knot in the season finale. Howard finds himself alone with Bernadette after the sudden passing of his mother; while Raj is not only talking to women – he’s getting exclusive with Emily. Together, they will all learn that life is far more complicated outside of the lab as love and friendship never produce predictable results!

episodes.name: The Conjugal Conjecture
episodes.overview: After Sheldon’s mother and Leonard's father share an evening together, everyone deals with an awkward morning the next day. Also, Penny’s family arrives for the wedding ceremony, including her anxiety-ridden mother, Susan, and her drug dealing brother, Randall.

episodes.name: The Military Miniaturization
episodes.overview: Colonel Williams, an Air Force representative from the Department of Material Command sits down to talk with Wolowitz.

episodes.name: The Dependence Transcendence
episodes.overview: Tensions rise when the boys struggle to complete their government project on time and Sheldon tries an energy drink to stay awake. Also, Penny and Amy go to a “party” at Bert the geologist’s house, and Koothrappali learns Bernadette’s true feelings about her pregnancy when they clean out the future baby room.

episodes.name: The Cohabitation Experimentation
episodes.overview: When Amy’s apartment floods, she proposes a “cohabitation experiment” with Sheldon. Also, Howard and Bernadette are upset when Koothrappali learns the gender of the baby before they do.

episodes.name: The Hot Tub Contamination
episodes.overview: Leonard and Penny must separate a quarreling Sheldon and Amy when their cohabitation does not go as planned, and Sheldon threatens to break off their relationship when Amy refuses to adhere to the bathroom schedule. Also, Howard and Bernadette find unexpected guests at their house when they decide to stay home from a planned vacation.

episodes.name: The Fetal Kick Catalyst
episodes.overview: Penny is surprised to learn she has fans of her performance in "Serial Ape-ist" when she attends Van Nuys Comic Con with Leonard. Also, Amy hosts a Sheldon-style brunch at Penny’s apartment, and Wolowitz makes an impulsive purchase when he starts stressing out about the baby on the way.

episodes.name: The Veracity Elasticity
episodes.overview: In order to continue living with Sheldon, Amy lies to him about repairs being made to her apartment and they host an "on location" episode of "Fun With Flags" in Penny’s apartment. Also, Leonard lets Penny decorate Sheldon’s old room after he learns that she has been secretly moving Leonard’s collectibles into storage.

episodes.name: The Brain Bowl Incubation
episodes.overview: After a successful experiment combining their genes, Sheldon will stop at nothing to convince Amy they should procreate. Also, Koothrappali is embarrassed to tell the gang what the new woman he’s dating does for a living.

episodes.name: The Geology Elevation
episodes.overview: When Bert, a Caltech geologist, wins the MacArthur Genius fellowship, Sheldon is overcome with jealousy. Also, Wolowitz finds an old remote control Stephen Hawking action figure he invented.

episodes.name: The Property Division Collision
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Leonard try to divvy up their shared belongings, but can’t agree on anything. Also, Koothrappali and Stuart fight to be the most helpful during Bernadette’s final weeks of pregnancy.

episodes.name: The Birthday Synchronicity
episodes.overview: Howard and Bernadette welcome their new baby and Sheldon and Amy celebrate Amy’s birthday.

episodes.name: The Holiday Summation
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy visit Leonard and Penny for the first time since the holidays and share details about their terrible trip to Texas.

episodes.name: The Romance Recalibration
episodes.overview: When Penny feels that Leonard is taking her for granted, she decides to go on a spa weekend with Amy. Also, Wolowitz and Koothrappali try to fix a squeaky floorboard in the baby’s room.

episodes.name: The Emotion Detection Automation
episodes.overview: Sheldon beta-tests an MIT invention after hearing it can help him read people’s emotions. Also, Leonard can’t hide his feelings when Penny announces her brother is coming to town, and Raj invites his ex-girlfriends over to give him dating advice.

episodes.name: The Locomotion Reverberation
episodes.overview: Leonard and Wolowitz try to distract Sheldon when he slows the progress of their guidance system. Also, Penny and Amy take Bernadette out for the night, leaving Raj and Stuart to care for baby Halley.

episodes.name: The Allowance Evaporation
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy have their first fight since moving in together, and Koothrappali is shocked at the realities of financial independence when he stops receiving support from his father.

episodes.name: The Comic-Con Conundrum
episodes.overview: With Koothrappali cut off from his father’s fortune, he appoints Sheldon to help him get out of debt. Also, Penny considers joining Leonard at Comic-Con.

episodes.name: The Escape Hatch Identification
episodes.overview: When Raj moves out of his apartment, Leonard and Penny offer him Sheldon's old room.

episodes.name: The Collaboration Fluctuation
episodes.overview: Leonard, Penny and Raj adjust to their new living arrangement, and Sheldon takes an interest in Amy’s work.

episodes.name: The Recollection Dissipation
episodes.overview: Sheldon pushes himself to the limit when he collaborates on projects with Leonard and Wolowitz as well as Amy on the same day. Also, Bernadette is nearing the end of her maternity leave and must return to work.

episodes.name: The Separation Agitation
episodes.overview: Howard and Bernadette have a hard time leaving Halley in day care when Bernadette returns to work. Also, Bert introduces the gang to his new girlfriend, Rebecca.

episodes.name: The Cognition Regeneration
episodes.overview: Leonard isn’t thrilled when Penny considers taking a new job offered by her ex-boyfriend, Zack.

episodes.name: The Gyroscopic Collapse
episodes.overview: After Leonard, Sheldon and Wolowitz celebrate the completion of the top secret air force project, they are met with an unpleasant surprise. Also, Amy is offered a summer position as a visiting researcher.

episodes.name: The Long Distance Dissonance
episodes.overview: The gang is concerned when Sheldon’s former admirer, Dr. Ramona Nowitzki, resurfaces while Amy is away at Princeton.

10.name: Season 10
10.overview: Leonard and Penny renew their vows, this time inviting their friends and family for wedding party; they also learn that marriage is about compromise, and figure out how to support each other. Sheldon and Amy experiment to take their relationship to the next level, and after an emotional struggle they move in together in Penny's old apartment. Howard and Bernadette realise that being a parent is a full-time job, but with the help of their friends they manage to find joy in raising their child. When his friends tell him he's extremely spoiled, Raj decides to stop taking his father's money and learn how to make ends meet.

episodes.name: The Proposal Proposal
episodes.overview: In the eleventh season opener, Amy gives Sheldon an answer to his proposal while Howard and Bernadette struggle with some unexpected news.

episodes.name: The Retraction Reaction
episodes.overview: Leonard angers the university – and the entire physics community – after he gives an embarrassing interview. Also, Amy and Bernadette bond over having to hide their success from Sheldon and Howard.

episodes.name: The Relaxation Integration
episodes.overview: Sheldon struggles with picking a wedding date. Amy decides she wants a wedding near a cliff which Sheldon doesn't want. Meanwhile Raj and Stuart fight over one of Bernadette's co-workers.

episodes.name: The Explosion Implosion
episodes.overview: As Howard worries about fatherhood, he and Sheldon bond when they jointly assemble a model rocket. Meanwhile, Penny bonds with Leonard's mother, Beverly, much to his concern.

episodes.name: The Collaboration Contamination
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Koothrappali confide in Bernadette when they can't handle Amy and Wolowitz working together. Also, Penny and Leonard learn new tactics for how to deal Sheldon from an unlikely source.

episodes.name: The Proton Regeneration
episodes.overview: Sheldon goes head-to-head with Wil Wheaton for the role of the new Professor Proton. Also, Penny steps in to take care of Halley when Bernadette and Wolowitz both wind up on bed rest.

episodes.name: The Geology Methodology
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Bert collaborate on a research project, despite Sheldon’s embarrassment. Also, Penny and Bernadette coach Koothrappali on how to navigate his relationship with Ruchi.

episodes.name: The Tesla Recoil
episodes.overview: Leonard and Wolowitz are furious after they learn Sheldon went to work with the military behind their backs. Also, while Bernadette is on bed rest, she asks Raj to do some digging when she suspects Ruchi is trying to steal her job.

episodes.name: The Bitcoin Entanglement
episodes.overview: Sheldon tries to teach the guys a lesson after they cut him out of a potentially valuable Bitcoin investment. Also, a seven-year-old video reveals a secret about Leonard and Penny's relationship.

episodes.name: The Confidence Erosion
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy try to eliminate stress from wedding planning by applying math to the process. Also, Koothrappali “breaks up” with Wolowitz after realizing his best friend is actually hurting his confidence.

episodes.name: The Celebration Reverberation
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Wolowitz plan birthday celebrations for Amy and Halley, respectively. Also, Leonard get a Christmas letter from his brother that causes him to spiral out about his own lack of accomplishments.

episodes.name: The Matrimonial Metric
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy will try to use science to see who should be their Maid of Honor and Best Man.

episodes.name: The Solo Oscillation
episodes.overview: When Sheldon kicks Amy out to work solo, she and Leonard bond during a series of science experiments. Also, Bert the geologist replaces Wolowitz in the band Footprints on the Moon, and Sheldon finds Penny a surprising source of scientific inspiration.

episodes.name: The Separation Triangulation
episodes.overview: Koothrappali finds himself in the middle of domestic drama when he learns the woman he's dating, has a very upset husband. Also, when Sheldon rents his old room back for a quiet place to work, he drives Leonard crazy by being a model tenant.

episodes.name: The Novelization Correlation
episodes.overview: Leonard's book raises questions, and Amy guest stars on the new Professor Proton show.

episodes.name: The Neonatal Nomenclature
episodes.overview: When Bernadette won't go into labor, the gang tries different tactics to get things started. Howard confronts Bernadette after Amy accidentally reveals she's already chosen their son's name.

episodes.name: The Athenaeum Allocation
episodes.overview: Leonard jumps through hoops to help secure the perfect wedding venue for Sheldon and Amy. Also, Bernadette and Wolowitz have a hard time deciding who should stay at home with the kids and who should go back to work.

episodes.name: The Gates Excitation
episodes.overview: Bill Gates visits Penny's work, and the gang schemes to meet him. Hilarity ensues.

episodes.name: The Tenant Disassociation
episodes.overview: When Leonard learns Sheldon is the president of the tenants association, he decides to run against him. Also, Bernadette encourages Wolowitz and Koothrappali to find the owner of a drone after they find it in the backyard.

episodes.name: The Reclusive Potential
episodes.overview: A brilliant but reclusive scientist, Doctor Wolcott, invites Sheldon to his cabin in the middle of nowhere, and Leonard, Raj and Howard go along for the trip. Also, Penny and Bernadette improvise after Amy doesn’t like the tame bachelorette party they planned for her.

episodes.name: The Comet Polarization
episodes.overview: Sheldon’s comic book store experiences changes when writer Neil Gaiman puts Stuart’s store on the map. Also, Koothrappali takes credit for Penny’s astronomical discovery, and friendships are threatened.

episodes.name: The Monetary Insufficiency
episodes.overview: Sheldon goes to Vegas to win money for science. Also, Penny and Bernadette take Amy wedding dress shopping, but her terrible choice entangles them in a web of lies.

episodes.name: The Sibling Realignment
episodes.overview: When Sheldon learns that his mother won’t attend his wedding unless he invites his brother, Georgie, he and Leonard travel to Texas to end a family feud. Also, the Wolowitz kids inadvertently infest Amy, Bernadette, Wolowitz and Koothrappali with pinkeye.

episodes.name: The Bow Tie Asymmetry
episodes.overview: When Amy's parents and Sheldon's family arrive, everybody is focused to make sure all wedding arrangements go according to plan – everyone except the bride and groom.

11.name: Season 11
11.overview: After years of only looking out for himself, Sheldon found Amy Farrah Fowler to be the most patient woman to ever walk the earth, and... they did it! Wedding fever continues in season 11.

episodes.name: The Conjugal Configuration
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy's honeymoon runs aground in New York. Penny and Leonard discover they are uncomfortably similar to Amy's parents. Raj insults physicist Neil deGrasse Tyson and starts a Twitter war.

episodes.name: The Wedding Gift Wormhole
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy drive themselves crazy trying to figure out what 'perfect gift' Leonard and Penny gave them for their wedding. Raj decides he wants to settle down and asks his father to arrange a marriage for him.

episodes.name: The Procreation Calculation
episodes.overview: The Wolowitzes' life gets complicated when Stuart starts bringing his new girlfriend home. Penny and Leonard talk about starting a family. Raj explores an arranged marriage.

episodes.name: The Tam Turbulence
episodes.overview: When Sheldon won't tell anyone why he's never mentioned his childhood best friend, Leonard takes matters into his own hands. Bernadette and Penny take out Raj’s fiancée for dinner to get the skinny on her.

episodes.name: The Planetarium Collision
episodes.overview: When Amy doesn’t have time to work on super-asymmetry, Sheldon goes to great lengths to ensure she’s available to work with him even it if means accidentally sabotaging her career in the process. Raj doesn’t want Howard to join him in hosting a show at the planetarium.

episodes.name: The Imitation Perturbation
episodes.overview: When Howard dresses up as Sheldon for Halloween, Sheldon seeks retaliation at Leonard and Penny's Halloween party. Leonard is shocked that Penny doesn't remember their first kiss.

episodes.name: The Grant Allocation Derivation
episodes.overview: Leonard is caught between a rock and a hard place when he's responsible for distributing extra grant money. Bernadette turns the backyard playhouse into a hideaway from Howard and the kids.

episodes.name: The Consummation Deviation
episodes.overview: Sheldon tries to bond with Amy's father, but when Howard lures Mr. Fowler away with magic tricks, Sheldon has no choice but to bond with Mrs. Fowler. Raj and Anu try to get physical for the first time.

episodes.name: The Citation Negation
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy are devastated after learning from a Russian paper that Super Asymmetry has already been discovered and disproven. Ultra-competitive Bernadette asks Stuart’s girlfriend to teach her how to beat Howard in a popular video game.

episodes.name: The VCR Illumination
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy are still down about their theory being disproven, but a VHS tape from Sheldon’s past inspires him not to give up. Bernadette turns into a pageant mom when she tries to help Howard ace his Magic Castle audition.

episodes.name: The Paintball Scattering
episodes.overview: Penny and Leonard organize a paintball game that results in mayhem when Sheldon is jealous of Amy. Also, Koothrappali catches Anu with her ex-boyfriend, and Stuart doesn’t want to move in with Denise.

episodes.name: The Propagation Proposition
episodes.overview: Penny’s ex-boyfriend, Zack, and his wife want a baby, but when Zack is infertile, they ask Leonard for help. Also, Koothrappali attempts to mend things with his ex-fiancée, Anu.

episodes.name: The Confirmation Polarization
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy are thrilled when their super asymmetry theory is proven by two physicists, until they try to kick Amy off the Nobel nomination; Bernadette has a big success at work.

episodes.name: The Meteorite Manifestation
episodes.overview: Sheldon is thrilled to help Bernadette and Wolowitz navigate bureaucratic paperwork, until he discovers they are breaking the law. Also, Leonard is disappointed when his friends exclude him from a scientific project.

episodes.name: The Donation Oscillation
episodes.overview: Penny tries to seduce an abstaining Leonard to ruin his "donation" for her ex-boyfriend, Zack, and his wife, Marissa. Also, Wolowitz, Bernadette, Anu and Koothrappali turn Koothrappali's canceled bachelor party into a couple's trip.

episodes.name: The D & D Vortex
episodes.overview: The gang finds out Wil Wheaton hosts a celebrity Dungeons and Dragons game involving William Shatner, Joe Manganiello, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and Kevin Smith. Deception and betrayal are the path to make it to the one open seat.

episodes.name: The Conference Valuation
episodes.overview: When Penny and Bernadette go to San Diego for a pharmaceutical sales convention, Wolowitz is in charge of the kids. Also, Sheldon finds a book on experimenting on kids, and the guys plus Amy make a day of it.

episodes.name: The Laureate Accumulation
episodes.overview: When competitors Pemberton and Campbell charm America on a publicity tour, Sheldon and Amy try to bring Nobel laureates Kip Thorne, George Smoot and Frances Arnold to their side. Also, Halley's fear of the dark leads to opportunity and conflict for Howard, Bernadette and Stuart.

episodes.name: The Inspiration Deprivation
episodes.overview: The concept of what it would mean for women everywhere if Amy were to win a Nobel Prize causes Amy to have a meltdown. Also, Koothrappali and Wolowitz try to relive the good old days after Wolowitz buys a scooter that looks like the one he had years ago.

episodes.name: The Decision Reverberation
episodes.overview: Koothrappali is worried people won’t take him seriously in his own field after publishing a paper that suggests he may have discovered alien life. Also, Leonard wants to be the principal investigator on a plasma physics study.

episodes.name: The Plagiarism Schism
episodes.overview: Kripke has proof that Dr. Pemberton plagiarized his thesis in college, and Sheldon and Amy aren't sure if they should turn him in or not; Wolowitz learns that Bernadette wasn't the only waitress at the Cheesecake Factory who had a crush on him.

episodes.name: The Maternal Conclusion
episodes.overview: Leonard is pleasantly surprised when Beverly comes to visit and she's genuinely kind to him, until he finds out the real reason she's there. Also, Denise and Stuart overstay their welcome at the Wolowitz house.

episodes.name: The Change Constant / The Stockholm Syndrome
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy await big news.

episodes.name: Unraveling the Mystery: A Big Bang Farewell
episodes.overview: Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco will lead fans on a trip down memory lane, sharing some of the best-kept backstage secrets and personal memories from the past 12 years.

12.name: Season 12
12.overview: Best friends and brilliant physicists Leonard Hofstadter and Sheldon Cooper are geniuses in the lab but socially challenge outside of it. Despite this, Leonard married his beautiful, street-smart neighbour, Penny. And Sheldon, after a long courtship, wed successful neurobiologist Amy. And while aerospace engineer Howard and his adorable microbiologist wife, Bernadette, explore the predicament of being married with two kids, astrophysicist Raj considers a traditional arranged marriage. As the supersmart friends solve quotidian conundrums posed by academia. Family crises and video games, their experiments in domestic bliss never fail to produce hilarious results. But all good theories arrive at a conclusion. The twelfth and final season of "television's perpetual laughter continuum comprises" 24 supercharged episodes that take comedy to the next dimension...and beyond.
